column4: lol, oh man, thats *really* bad, I didn't have the normal "breezy main" repos in my sources.list...glad I noticed that.  Should be correct now.
When I do a dist-upgrade, does it remove all the old stuff i don't need from the old version and replace it with the new stuff?
so I don't have to worry about having old files for the core stuff, like kernel and such?
